DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all security alerts, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read all security alerts that you have access to.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all security alerts, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write to all security alerts
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write to all security alerts, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and write all alerts that you have access to.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write to all security alerts
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write to all security alerts, without a signed-in user.
